SEARCH
Package de.tum.cit.ase.maze.GameComponents

Class Block

java.lang.Object
de.tum.cit.ase.maze.GameComponents.Block
public class Block extends Object
Represents a single block within a maze in a maze runner game. A block is a fundamental unit that can have different types, such as wall, path, etc.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a new Block with specified row, column, and type.
